themes: Perceived inequity between applicant types in Elevate
Negative impact of new funding structure on organizations
Lack of transparency and selective community input in program design
Concerns about overemphasis on accessibility and equity
Organizational closures due to funding loss
key_phrases: Elevate, currently is a dumping ground for applicants
non-profit organizations compete against for profit businesses and individual artists
the system that worked for 25 years was much better
structure that was designed behind closed doors with selective community input
if all of the focus is put on accessibility and equity, you will see organizational doors close
the way it has been handled has been divisive and alienating
barriers_identified: Competition between fundamentally different applicant types (non-profits, for-profits, individual artists)
Lack of transparency in program design
Divisive implementation of equity and accessibility goals
Loss of funding leading to organizational closures
solutions_proposed: Return to the previous funding system
